props.title: Thoralby Through Time 2
props.description: Discover the rich heritage of Thoralby and Bishopdale through stories, photographs, and maps spanning centuries of Yorkshire Dales history.

props.content: Dive into different aspects of Thoralby history through our curated collections of people, places, events, and photographs.

cards.title: People & Families
cards.description: Discover the stories of families who shaped Thoralby through generations.

cards.title: Buildings & Placess
cards.description: Explore the historic architecture and landmarks of Bishopdale.

cards.title: Historical Timeline
cards.description: Journey through centuries of events that defined our community.

cards.title: Photo Archive
cards.description: Browse our collection of historical photographs and images.

cards.title: Maps & Geography
cards.description: Compare historical and modern maps of Thoralby and surroundings.

cards.title: About This Project
cards.description: Learn about our mission to preserve local history for future generations.

props.title: Help Us Preserve Our Heritage
props.content: Do you have photographs, documents, or stories about Thoralby and Bishopdale? We would love to hear from you and add your contributions to our archive.
